pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'Rcpp' Bindings to 'Magic Enum' 'C++' 'Enum' Support // The header-only modern 'C++' template library 'Magic Enum' for static reflection of 'enums' (to string, from string, iteration) is provided by this package. More information about the underlying library can be found at its repository at https://github.com/Neargye/magic_enum.
